column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I think a good pizza is about a good crust and sauce
column2: toppings yeah they are important but without the crust and sauce the toppings don't matter.  Lou's has the best crust and sauce I've ever had on a pizza
column3: the toppings are also excellent.  It's just fantastic substantive pizza that doesn't get overwhelmed by stuff toppings (If you want the obscenely thick stuffed pizza head to Giordano's
column4: Lou's isn't that and they are better because of it).
